# Rust .gitignore
# Covers both Unix and Windows platforms

# Cargo build artifacts
target/
Cargo.lock

# Backup files
**/*.rs.bk

# Debug symbols
*.pdb

# Executables (Windows)
*.exe

# Compiled libraries
*.rlib
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib

# Test artifacts
*.profraw
*.profdata

# Flamegraph artifacts
flamegraph.svg
perf.data
perf.data.old

# Generated by cargo-fuzz
fuzz/corpus/
fuzz/artifacts/

# Memory profiling
massif.out.*
*.svg

# IDEs and editors
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~
.*.swp

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# rustc artifacts
*.o
*.a
*.bc

# Cargo cache
.cargo/

# rust-analyzer cache
.rust-analyzer/

# Documentation builds
doc/
target/doc/

# Benchmarks
criterion/
